wikitext.*:
{{Disambig-two|the soundtrack from ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey|An Unexpected Journey]]''|location|[[Edge of the Wild]]}}
'''The Edge of the Wild''' is the seventeenth track of disc two of ''[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack - Special Edition]]'', by [[Howard Shore]]. It is the fourth of four 'exclusive bonus tracks'.
